duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide expert legal counsel on a range of activities covering the promotion, distribution, support, and sale of innovative medicines.
Advise on promotion, sale, and distribution activities and provide significant product support as a brand/asset lawyer.
Counsel on US commercial programs, fraud and abuse laws, and regulations.
Engage with cross-functional teams and matrix partners to drive agendas and communicate complex information effectively.
Partner with the Compliance function to ensure policies and standard operating procedures are fit-for-purpose.
Manage outside counsel in limited circumstances.
Provide effective counseling of the US pharmaceutical business to support successful performance by driving strategic initiatives and ensuring compliance with the US legal framework.

education_certification.credential: Juris Doctor (J.D.) and current member of a state bar
